cascom.fipa.envelope
Class BitEfficientEnvelopeCodec

java.lang.Object
  cascom.fipa.envelope.BitEfficientEnvelopeCodec
All Implemented Interfaces:
EnvelopeCodec
public class BitEfficientEnvelopeCodec
extends java.lang.Object
implements EnvelopeCodec

Main class for bit-efficient encoder and decoder. This class can be used to decode and encode ACL messages to bit-efficient encoding.

Author:
Ahti Syreeni - TeliaSonera
See Also:
FIPA Agent Message Transport Envelope Representation in Bit Efficient Specification This class is thread safe as the decode and encode methods are internally synchronized. More effective solutions can be considered in the future.
